data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Acosta, Roxana, Hastriter, Michael W. (2017): A review of the flea genus Phalacropsylla Rothschild, 1915 (Siphonaptera, Ctenophthalmidae, Neopsyllinae, Phalacropsyllini) with new host and distributional records. ZooKeys 675: 27-43, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.675.12347, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.675.12347
